name: Yukki Music Bot
description: Telegram Group Calls streaming bot with some useful features, written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls. Supporting platforms like Youtube, Spotify, Resso, AppleMusic, Soundcloud and M3u8 Links.

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Get a mongodb url from https://cloud.mongodb.com . You can leave it blank if you want , bot will use Yukki's database for you.

MUSIC_BOT_NAME.description: A name for your Music Bot. Please don't use ascii characters

OWNER_ID.description: The user id(s) of user(s) whom you would like to add as a OWNER. Multiple values shall be seperated with a space.

STRING_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram String Session. One Assistant is Compulsory.

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Your Log Group ID, add your bot and promote as an admin with full rights!. Use only Group. Please don't use Channel ID.

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: If you dont know this, Leave as it is
